skill_e.tooltip: Teemo's basic attacks poison their target, dealing ? magical damage upon impact and ? magical damage each second for ? seconds.

skill_i.tooltip: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

skill_q.tooltip: Deals ? magic damage and blinds the target for ? seconds.

skill_r.tooltip:
Tosses a stored mushroom as a trap that detonates if an enemy steps on it, spreading poison to nearby enemies that slows Movement Speed by ?%, reveals them and deals ? magic damage over ? seconds.

Traps last ? minutes and take ? second to arm and stealth. Up to ? Traps can be held at once. If a thrown trap lands on another trap, it will bounce up to ? Teemos further before planting.

skill_w.tooltip:
Passive: Teemo's Movement Speed is increased by ?% unless he has been damaged by an enemy champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining twice his normal bonus for ? seconds. This bonus is not lost when struck.
